ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Dalnir: any bard toys?
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, they did patch saying that Dalnir mobs were casting spells WELL above thier ability. Hopefully that was fixed. ... [Non-text portions of this message
ygData.messageBody:
Well, they did patch saying that Dalnir mobs were casting spells WELL above thier ability. Hopefully that
was fixed.

Lyrnia Jongleur wrote:

> Only thing you need in Dalnir is off the Kly Imprecator (sp?). The ancient
> coin (Royal Crown of Dalnir) for the Ancient Coin Quest
>
> Hehe. And I got one long before I went to Dalnir.
>
> HOWEVER:
> The boss mob of the dungeon drops the Necklace of Superiority or whatever.
>
> 5AC, +5 to all stats. +10 to all resists.
>
> Be warned: His placeholder has a 1000dmg AOE Attack. So does he and he has
> 2x the hp.
>
> The placeholder (Kly Overseer) dropped a full group of 6 40+ members
>
> (oh, did I mention he was blue to level 39 ?)
>
> Lyrnia Jongleur
> Bard of Norrath
> <Travelers of Norrath>
>
> > We're starting to explore Dalnir now in force. I'm told there's bard
> stuff
> > there but I think it's just a ploy to get me to log in my bard.
> >
> > Without huge spoilers, anything a bard can look forward to in here?
> Cleric?
> >
> > Of course I'll continue going even if there's just xp and good times
> alone,
> > it's just nice to have a goal.
> >
> > (admit it, lower guk was a lot more exciting to explore when you saw what
> > people were hauling out of there :P)
> >
>

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
